title: Alone T01
description:
After the sudden and unexplained disappearance of the residents of Fortville, five surviving children to fend for themselves in a world without adults.

Synopsis of part 1:
Fortville, a summer evening. The school year is not over yet, the children go home to rest. 
The next morning, Fortville is deserted. Mysteriously, everyone seems to have disappeared. Now the children are left to fend for themselves.

I hope you enjoy this comic! 

------------------------------------------------------------
Note:

If you never read E-comics before, you should download a program like ComicRack, (you can find that here: http://www.softpedia.com/get/Multimedia/Graphic/Graphic-Viewers/ComicRack.shtml).
Then, you can use ".cbr" files and open them with ComicRack.
It's easy to use, and has a great quality!

Hope you enjoy!
